findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.redeemFresh(address,uint256,uint256) (RToken.sol#1799-1893):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (RToken.sol#1839)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply = vars.totalSupplyNew (RToken.sol#1882)
	RTokenStorage.totalSupply (RToken.sol#257) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- RToken.exchangeRateStoredInternal() (RToken.sol#1524-1554)
	- RTokenStorage.totalSupply (RToken.sol#257)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.liquidateBorrowInternal(address,uint256,RTokenInterface) (RToken.sol#2114-2129):
	External calls:
	- error = RTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (RToken.sol#2121)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,RTokenCollateral) (RToken.sol#2128)
		- allowed = ironController.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2039)
		- allowed = ironController.seizeAllowed(address(this),seizeRToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2236)
		- allowed = ironController.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(RTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2142)
		- seizeError = RTokenCollateral.seize(liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2195)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,RTokenCollateral) (RToken.sol#2128)
		- totalBorrows = vars.totalBorrowsNew (RToken.sol#2094)
	RTokenStorage.totalBorrows (RToken.sol#247) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- RToken.accrueInterest() (RToken.sol#1569-1647)
	- RToken.borrowRatePerBlock() (RToken.sol#1420-1422)
	- RToken.exchangeRateStoredInternal() (RToken.sol#1524-1554)
	- RToken.supplyRatePerBlock() (RToken.sol#1428-1430)
	- RTokenStorage.totalBorrows (RToken.sol#247)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
RToken.initialize(IronControllerInterface,InterestRateModel,uint256,string,string,uint8) (RToken.sol#1210-1241) should emit an event for: 
	- initialExchangeRateMantissa = initialExchangeRateMantissa_ (RToken.sol#1220)
findings.name: events-maths

Reentrancy in RToken.borrowFresh(address,uint256) (RToken.sol#1922-1986):

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.transfeRTokens(address,address,address,uint256) (RToken.sol#1252-1312):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.transferAllowed(address(this),src,dst,tokens) (RToken.sol#1254)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountTokens[src] = srRTokensNew (RToken.sol#1297)
	- accountTokens[dst] = dstTokensNew (RToken.sol#1298)
	- transferAllowances[src][spender] = allowanceNew (RToken.sol#1302)

Reentrancy in RToken.seizeInternal(address,address,address,uint256) (RToken.sol#2234-2281):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.seizeAllowed(address(this),seizeRToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2236)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountTokens[borrower] = borroweRTokensNew (RToken.sol#2270)
	- accountTokens[liquidator] = liquidatoRTokensNew (RToken.sol#2271)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.redeemFresh(address,uint256,uint256) (RToken.sol#1799-1893):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (RToken.sol#1839)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- failOpaque(Error.IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.REDEEM_IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed) (RToken.sol#1841)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- fail(Error.TOKEN_INSUFFICIENT_CASH,FailureInfo.REDEEM_TRANSFER_OUT_NOT_POSSIBLE) (RToken.sol#1866)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REDEEM_NEW_TOTAL_SUPPLY_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (RToken.sol#1856)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.REDEEM_FRESHNESS_CHECK) (RToken.sol#1846)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REDEEM_NEW_ACCOUNT_BALANCE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (RToken.sol#1861)
	- Redeem(redeemer,vars.redeemAmount,vars.redeemTokens) (RToken.sol#1887)
	- Transfer(redeemer,address(this),vars.redeemTokens) (RToken.sol#1886)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.liquidateBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,RTokenInterface) (RToken.sol#2140-2209):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(RTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2142)
	- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2174)
		- allowed = ironController.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2039)
	- seizeError = seizeInternal(address(this),liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2193)
		- allowed = ironController.seizeAllowed(address(this),seizeRToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2236)
	- seizeError = RTokenCollateral.seize(liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2195)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LiquidateBorrow(liquidator,borrower,actualRepayAmount,address(RTokenCollateral),seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2202)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.liquidateBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,RTokenInterface) (RToken.sol#2140-2209):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(RTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2142)
	- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2174)
		- allowed = ironController.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2039)
	- seizeError = seizeInternal(address(this),liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2193)
		- allowed = ironController.seizeAllowed(address(this),seizeRToken,liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2236)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- seizeError = seizeInternal(address(this),liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2193)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- seizeError = seizeInternal(address(this),liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2193)
	- Transfer(borrower,liquidator,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2274)
		- seizeError = seizeInternal(address(this),liquidator,borrower,seizeTokens) (RToken.sol#2193)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.liquidateBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,RTokenInterface) (RToken.sol#2140-2209):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(RTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2142)
	- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2174)
		- allowed = ironController.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2039)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2174)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2174)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(TokenErrorReporter.Error(repayBorrowError),FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_REPAY_BORROW_FRESH_FAILED),0) (RToken.sol#2176)
	- RepayBorrow(payer,borrower,vars.actualRepayAmount,vars.accountBorrowsNew,vars.totalBorrowsNew) (RToken.sol#2097)
		- (repayBorrowError,actualRepayAmount) = repayBorrowFresh(liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2174)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.mintFresh(address,uint256) (RToken.sol#1682-1747):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.mintAllowed(address(this),minter,mintAmount) (RToken.sol#1684)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.MINT_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (RToken.sol#1691)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- (failOpaque(Error.IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.MINT_IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed),0) (RToken.sol#1686)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- (failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.MINT_EXCHANGE_RATE_READ_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)),0) (RToken.sol#1698)
	- Mint(minter,vars.actualMintAmount,vars.mintTokens) (RToken.sol#1739)
	- Transfer(address(this),minter,vars.mintTokens) (RToken.sol#1740)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.liquidateBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256,RTokenInterface) (RToken.sol#2140-2209):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.liquidateBorrowAllowed(address(this),address(RTokenCollateral),liquidator,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2142)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(Error.INVALID_ACCOUNT_PAIR,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_LIQUIDATOR_IS_BORROWER),0) (RToken.sol#2159)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(Error.INVALID_CLOSE_AMOUNT_REQUESTED,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_CLOSE_AMOUNT_IS_ZERO),0) (RToken.sol#2164)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- (failOpaque(Error.IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed),0) (RToken.sol#2144)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_COLLATERAL_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (RToken.sol#2154)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (RToken.sol#2149)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(Error.INVALID_CLOSE_AMOUNT_REQUESTED,FailureInfo.LIQUIDATE_CLOSE_AMOUNT_IS_UINT_MAX),0) (RToken.sol#2169)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.borrowFresh(address,uint256) (RToken.sol#1922-1986):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.borrowAllowed(address(this),borrower,borrowAmount) (RToken.sol#1924)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Borrow(borrower,borrowAmount,vars.accountBorrowsNew,vars.totalBorrowsNew) (RToken.sol#1979)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- failOpaque(Error.IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.BORROW_IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed) (RToken.sol#1926)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.BORROW_NEW_ACCOUNT_BORROW_BALANCE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (RToken.sol#1953)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.BORROW_FRESHNESS_CHECK) (RToken.sol#1931)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- fail(Error.TOKEN_INSUFFICIENT_CASH,FailureInfo.BORROW_CASH_NOT_AVAILABLE) (RToken.sol#1936)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.BORROW_ACCUMULATED_BALANCE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (RToken.sol#1948)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.BORROW_NEW_TOTAL_BALANCE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)) (RToken.sol#1958)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in RToken.repayBorrowFresh(address,address,uint256) (RToken.sol#2037-2104):
	External calls:
	- allowed = ironController.repayBorrowAllowed(address(this),payer,borrower,repayAmount) (RToken.sol#2039)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- (failOpaque(Error.MATH_ERROR,FailureInfo.REPAY_BORROW_ACCUMULATED_BALANCE_CALCULATION_FAILED,uint256(vars.mathErr)),0) (RToken.sol#2057)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),0) (RToken.sol#723)
		- (fail(Error.MARKET_NOT_FRESH,FailureInfo.REPAY_BORROW_FRESHNESS_CHECK),0) (RToken.sol#2046)
	- Failure(uint256(err),uint256(info),opaqueError) (RToken.sol#732)
		- (failOpaque(Error.IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,FailureInfo.REPAY_BORROW_IRON_CONTROLLER_REJECTION,allowed),0) (RToken.sol#2041)
	- RepayBorrow(payer,borrower,vars.actualRepayAmount,vars.accountBorrowsNew,vars.totalBorrowsNew) (RToken.sol#2097)
